alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 5:00PM CDT until July 22 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Phelps County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Kearney County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Harlan County in south central Nebraska... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 500 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Funk, or 8 miles east of Holdrege, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wilcox around 520 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Ragan and Hildreth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
